name: Logical Switch Control
description: Controls logical operations based on the state of several variables.

fields.name: Variable that will be set when this actor is triggered
fields.description: The local variable that is set when this actor is triggered.

fields.name: Variable 1 that is checked
fields.description: The first local variable that is checked by this actor.

fields.name: Variable 2 that is checked
fields.description: The second local variable that is checked by this actor.

fields.name: Variable 3 that is checked
fields.description: The third local variable that is checked by this actor.

fields.name: Variable 4 that is checked
fields.description: The fourth local variable that is checked by this actor.

fields.name: Logical to use?
fields.description: Determines whether the logical condition will be used in the check.
